sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { arrProducts } from "../Service/products" import { useDispatch } from "react-redux" import { addToCart } from "../Redux/Slices/CustomFunctions" import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { links, styleLinks, styleText } from "./Products" export default function Product () { const dispatch = useDispatch() const { id } = useParams() const [productCard, setProductCard] = useState(arrProducts[0]) useEffect(() => { setProductCard(arrProducts.find(item => item.id === id)) }, [productCard]) const [arr, setArrProducts] = useState(arrProducts) console.log(arrProducts); useEffect(() => { setArrProducts(arr.slice().splice(0, 4)) }, []) return

{productCard.cardDescription}

Rp.{productCard.price}

Rp.{productCard.oldPrice}

{productCard.description}

Size

Color

SKU: {productCard.sku}

Category: {productCard.category}

Tags: {productCard.tags}

Share:

Description Additional Information Reviews [5]

{productCard.description}

{productCard.description}

{arr.map((item, index) => { return

{item.name}

{item.cardDescription}

Rp.{item.price} Rp.{item.oldPrice}
{links.map(({bg, title},index) => { return {title} })}
})}
}
